pricing.title: Choose the perfect plan for you
pricing.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of AI image generation. Flexible plans for all types of creators.

fastGeneration.title: Fast Generation
fastGeneration.description: Create amazing images in seconds with our advanced technology

commercialLicense.title: Commercial License
commercialLicense.description: Use your creations for commercial projects without restrictions

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You will continue to have access to features until the end of the paid period.

credits.question: Do unused credits expire?
credits.answer: Credits are renewed monthly. Unused credits are not carried over to the next month.

commercial.question: Can I use the generated images commercially?
commercial.answer: Yes, all paid plans include commercial license. You can use the images in personal and commercial projects.

free.question: How does the free plan work?
free.answer: The free plan offers 5 daily credits that are automatically renewed. Perfect for trying out our platform.

subscriptionRequired.title: Upgrade Required
subscriptionRequired.description: To use this model or feature, you need an active plan. Choose the perfect plan for you!
